text:
Credit: Grateful

The This Is Us star, 33, documented the celebration on Instagram. "My heart bursts for each and every one of these ladies," she captioned a group photo with 12 of her closest gal pals. "If you are the company you keep, then I am in excellent standing."
title: Mandy Moore Celebrates Engagement Party With Friends: Pics

meta_data.description: Mandy Moore celebrated her engagement to Taylor Goldsmith at a fun-filled party with friends including Minka Kelly, Raina Penchansky, This Is Us' Susan Kelechi Watson and more — see the photos!
